programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: The city of Atlanta has a rich history but with the city’s explosive growth, corruption has made its way into local politics. For one local Sheriff, a valiant attempt to clean it up results in a stunning, violent crime.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: Columbus, Ohio is often described as a big city with a small-town personality. The community is left reeling when a hard-working local teenager is gunned down, and his own twin brother is arrested for the crime.

programme.title: Find Our Missing
programme.sub-title: Find Our Missing - Pamela Butler/ Hassani Campbell
programme.desc: A well-to-do Program Analyst goes missing from her affluent home in the nation�s capitol. A 5-year-old disabled boy disappears from a busy Oakland, California neighborhood. They are two of the countless unsolved missing persons cases in the U.S. Help find our missing.

programme.title: Payback
programme.desc: When a man loses control of his wife and kids, he goes to murderous lengths to get revenge.

programme.title: Payback
programme.desc: After a deady night-time home invasion, the family suspects a vindictive ex-lover, but the case grows cold after the suspect disappears; thirty years later, a family member hungry for justice helps police track down the vengeful killer.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: When pregnant mother Megan Price is found dead in her home, there’s evidence that multiple people didn’t want her new baby to see the light of day. But a storm of clues keep leading to dead ends – until an unexpected witness comes forward with a story of a loose-lipped killer.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: When a former Miss Bahamas contestant disappears in Florida, her family fears something horrible has happened to her. As detectives start investigating, they quickly focus on a jealous boyfriend and a secret hook-up with an off-duty cop – until an unexpected discovery reveals the horrifying last moments of the beauty queen.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.sub-title: For My Man - Led Astray by Love
programme.desc: When a woman unlucky in love meets a smooth-talking older man, she thinks she has finally found someone to start a life with. But when detectives come knocking on her door after a woman goes missing, they discover a woman willing to do whatever it took to keep her man satisfied.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.sub-title: For My Man - Fallen From Redemption
programme.desc: When a young woman is released from prison, she is determined to live her life on the straight and narrow; however, her efforts are derailed after she falls hard for a handsome stranger who drags her down into a dark place.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.sub-title: Fatal Attraction - Secrets in the Storm
programme.desc: When exotic beauty Maria Christopher falls in love with a rising star, they are ready to take on the world by storm, but this blazing romance will crash and burn when police uncover a heinous crime shrouded in fire leaving a shocked community to wonder if passion and desire could ignite so much hate.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: In Detroit, Michigan, a cop's wife is killed in what looks like a botched robbery. As secrets simmer to the surface, police suspect a more personal motive. But the pieces of the puzzle don’t fit; until, a shocking confession blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Firefighters responding to an apartment fire make a grisly discovery: the charred body of a young woman. Detectives investigating the case wonder if this is the work of a killer who murdered four people only a few days earlier? As police dig deeper, they’ll discover clues that point to the killer’s greed.

programme.title: Sins of The Father
programme.desc: Police unearth a sinful conspiracy when they investigate the murder of a pastor's wife.

programme.title: Stranger Next Door
programme.desc: A recently-divorced and retired policewoman meets a handsome stranger who turns out to be Mr. Wrong.

programme.title: Blood on Her Badge
programme.desc: After cold-hearted cop, Dee falls for an aggressive drug dealer they begin robbing drivers during routine traffic stops. Soon she starts taking greater risks, but her world comes crashing down when he convinces her to commit a violent robbery, resulting in the gruesome murder of three people.

programme.title: Greed
programme.desc: When interior decorator Zuri Maxwell meets handsome benefactor and entrepreneur Godfrey Anderson, she compromises the values and morals that should guide her in an effort to be part of the moneyed world she so desperately wants to enter.

programme.title: Under The Influence
programme.desc: A woman�s life is thrown into a dangerous tailspin after ending an affair with the dangerous lover she met in Alcoholics Anonymous (AA).
